text: Erechthias indicans is a species of moth in the family Tineidae. It was described by Edward Meyrick in 1923. This species is endemic to New Zealand. The holotype specimen of this species was collected by George Vernon Hudson in Karori, Wellington. ==References== ==External links== *Image of type specimen of Erechthias indicans Category:Moths described in 1923 Category:Erechthiinae Category:Moths of New Zealand Category:Endemic fauna of New Zealand Category:Taxa named by Edward Meyrick
title: Erechthias indicans
